column5: does anybody know if the GST rebate discussed in the thread:https://www.walleyecentral.com/forums...ghlight=rebate still apply? i got the rebate for last year (2008). thanks, phish
I believe it is now only for guided excursions.

It is available on packages, not just lodging or items purchased. A package such as cabin, boat, motor, guide or flight. Basically 3 things combined. Your outfitter can do this if they choose andrebate it directly back to you and save you the time & hassle of waiting for it.

thanks - i just filled out the application again (as last year) and since i was the tour leader i labeled myself as the "tour operator". this worked last year for our package that included flights as well as the accomodations. will report back. phish
Your good to go with flights, accomodations, and, ect. You will get your refund in the mail.
